abstractText: BAYES is a computer program for stock-mixture analysis based on Bayesian methods. The methodology is described in Pella and Masuda (2001). BAYES is a Fortran 90 program with a windows-like interface written for an IBM-compatible personal computer. The Fortran code was compiled with the Lahey Fortran 90 compiler, release 4.50h (Lahey 1997).
title: Genetic stock mixture analysis using the software program BAYES v1.0
